description: The initiative, Karobia Njai, focuses on reconnecting individuals with their cultural roots and promoting the use of indigenous herbs for health and wellness. Through education and community engagement, it encourages self-acceptance and sustainable practices, emphasizing the importance of natural remedies over pharmaceutical solutions. By teaching people about the benefits of traditional nutrition and environmental stewardship, the initiative aims to foster a holistic approach to health and well-being.
name: Karobia Njai
